lead_paragraph: People took to Twitter to lament what they said was a frightening normalization of the fringe views that Mr. Bannon promoted as the chairman of Breitbart News.

byline.contributor: Michael D. Shear and Michael S. Schmidt reported from Washington, and Maggie Haberman from New York. Julie Hirschfeld Davis, Mark Landler, Jackie Calmes and Helene Cooper contributed reporting from Washington.
byline.original: By MICHAEL D. SHEAR, MAGGIE HABERMAN and MICHAEL S. SCHMIDT

headline.print_headline: Furor Over Trump’s Pick of a Hard-Right Adviser
headline.main: Critics See Stephen Bannon, Trump’s Pick for Strategist, as Voice of Racism

snippet: People took to Twitter to lament what they said was a frightening normalization of the fringe views that Mr. Bannon promoted as the chairman of Breitbart News....
abstract: Senior Democrats, some Republican strategists and civil rights groups fiercely denounce Donald Trump for appointing Stephen K Bannon to top White House position, warning that Bannon will introduce anti-Semitic, racist and nationalist views to West Wing; those familiar with Trump's staffing deliberations say Rudy Giulani has emerged as contender for secretary of state.
